title: Risk
excerpt: There are five key risks in any deal: Market, Product (a/k/a technology), Management, Business Model, and Capital

property1.name: Brad Feld
property1.title: Early stage investor and entrepreneur
property1.description:
There are five key risks in any deal:

  1. Market
  2. Product (a/k/a technology)
  3. Management
  4. Business Model
  5. Capital

Taking all five at once is crazy.

Most losses happen when you combine Market and Product risk â€“ take one, not both, and take it with a proven entrepreneur.
